definition: periodic table (chemistry)/abbr. of 元素週期表|元素周期表[yuan2 su4 zhou1 qi1 biao3], periodic table of the elements
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Why do we call it the Periodic Table?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼我們叫它週期表？

sentences.english: On the right side of the Periodic Table.
sentences.chinese: 元素週期表的右半部分。

sentences.english: And we can go on and on down the table.
sentences.chinese: 而且我們可以繼續沿着週期表往下走。

sentences.english: Technetium is number 43 on the periodic table.
sentences.chinese: 鍀是元素週期表中第43號元素。

sentences.english: Donors are over here, the metals on the left end of the Periodic Table.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，在元素週期表的左下部分的金屬。

sentences.english: She gave him a miniature copy of the periodic table of elements.
sentences.chinese: 她給了奧巴馬一個元素週期表的微型複製品。

sentences.english: Pick something about the Periodic Table.
sentences.chinese: 選個關於元素週期表的東西。

sentences.english: According to Mendeleyev's periodic table , there seem to be still some elements undiscovered yet .
sentences.chinese: 按照門捷列夫週期表，似乎還有一些元素尚未發現。

sentences.english: Everybody please take out a piece of paper and write the periodic table from memory.
sentences.chinese: 請大家拿出一張紙，默寫化學元素週期表。

sentences.english: You will be asked to write down the periodic table.
If you click on Periodic Table, you can get a variety of choices.
sentences.chinese: 如果你點擊週期表，你可以得到許多的選擇。

sentences.english: The six noble gases are found in the far right column of the periodic table.
sentences.chinese: 六種稀有氣體在元素週期表的最右側。

sentences.english: So, up here, atomic theory, periodic table, bonding, structures and molecules.
sentences.chinese: 原子理論，元素週期表，價鍵，分子結構。
